title: ★Walk to Redline!**NO FEE**
posting_body: Amazing East Arlington 2 bed 1 bath apartment on the third floor.
It's a 870 square ft modern apartment  with hardwood floors throughout.

It has two skylights, front balcony, back porch and also features an eat-in kitchen with microwave, dishwasher, refrigerator, garbage disposal, stove sharing the one in the second floor apartment with other two tenants, dining room,  free washer and dryer in unit.
Free driveway parking spots.
GAS HEAT!
Ideal Location!
It's on a quiet and safe, residential street, off Massachusetts Avenue, just over the Alington/Cambridge line.
15 minutes walk to Alewife station, 3 min walk to bus stops to Davis and Porter Squares, Harvard square, Tufts, MIT and Harvard Universities.
Easy car access to Route 2, I-93, I-95.
Commute to Boston is about 20-30 minutes by car or train.
Walk to Hardy Elementary school, Magnolia Park, Minuteman bike path, Fox library, Capital Theatre, Spy pond.
The neighborhood is bustling with restaurants, stores, libraries, movie-theatre, etc.
The rent includes water and parking !
Tenant pays other utilities.
First, last month's rent and security deposit required.
Good Credit!
Please click on the above purple reply button to contact me, Nancy.
Thanks
No BROKERS FEE.
No Smoking, no drugs please.
